eventDecorators.name: OwnerChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User withdraws his/her fixed deposit before maturity period.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerNominated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User withdraws his/her fixed deposit before maturity period.

eventDecorators.name: Vested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User withdraws his/her fixed deposit before maturity period.

eventDecorators.name: dTradeUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User withdraws his/her fixed deposit before maturity period.

functionDecorators.name: addVestingSchedule
functionDecorators.description: Construct a vesting schedule to release a quantities of DET over a series of intervals. Assumes that the quantities are nonzero and that the sequence of timestamps is strictly increasing. This may only be called by the owner during the contract's setup period.

functionDecorators.name: appendVestingEntry
functionDecorators.description: Add a new vesting entry at a given time and quantity to an account's schedule. A call to this should be accompanied by either enough balance already available in this contract, or a corresponding call to dtrade.endow(), to ensure that when the funds are withdrawn, there is enough balance, as well as correctly calculating the fees. This may only be called by the owner during the contract's setup period. Note; although this function could technically be used to produce unbounded arrays, it's only in the foundation's command to add to these lists.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The account to append a new vesting entry to.

parameterDecorators.name: time
parameterDecorators.description: The absolute unix timestamp after which the vested quantity may be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: quantity
parameterDecorators.description: The quantity of DET that will vest.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: A simple alias to totalVestedAccountBalance: provides ERC20 balance integration.

functionDecorators.name: getNextVestingEntry
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the next schedule entry that will vest for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: getNextVestingIndex
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the index of the next schedule entry that will vest for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: getNextVestingQuantity
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the quantity which the next schedule entry will vest for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: getNextVestingTime
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the time at which the next schedule entry will vest for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingQuantity
functionDecorators.description: Get the quantity of DET associated with a given schedule entry.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingScheduleEntry
functionDecorators.description: Get a particular schedule entry for an account.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingTime
functionDecorators.description: Get the time at which a given schedule entry will vest.

functionDecorators.name: numVestingEntries
functionDecorators.description: The number of vesting dates in an account's schedule.

functionDecorators.name: purgeAccount
functionDecorators.description: Destroy the vesting information associated with an account.

functionDecorators.name: vest
functionDecorators.description: Allow a user to withdraw any DET in their schedule that have vested.
